title: Submarine Route Deconfliction
description: A submarine planner must plot a safe underwater transit route that avoids known undersea obstacles, neutral submarine operating areas, and surface shipping.

tasks.description: Plot the desired route and depth profile for the submarine.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately enters the intended transit plan.

tasks.description: Overlay data on undersea mountains, known wrecks, neutral submarine patrol boxes, and dense shipping lanes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates a comprehensive 3D map of all underwater and surface hazards.

tasks.description: Adjust the submarine's route and depth to create a safe path that is clear of all identified hazards.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner successfully creates a safe and deconflicted underwater route.
